main_address_raw_text: 63, ramkrishna rd, sushrata nagar, hakim para, siliguri, west bengal 734001, india
long_description: ecotyl is a certified organic and sustainable brand. we bring to you 100% organic, eco-friendly, and high-quality products sourced from their best-grown locations across the country. we make sure that the environment is minimally impacted when we deliver high-quality products to you. ecotyl sources them in small batches, so they remain fresh when they are delivered to your doorsteps. at different stages, they undergo rigorous checks to meet the set food safety and hygiene standards. our products are vegan, pesticide-free, unadulterated, gmo-free, and are free from added food colours. we offer a range of more than 70 organic and eco-friendly products across 8 categories.
